summary: Me: Tomura is honestly so beautiful, it moves me to tears. He looks like an actual fairy, like an watercolor impressionist...
body:
Me: Tomura is honestly so beautiful, it moves me to tears. He looks like an actual fairy, like an watercolor impressionist painting, like a mermaid from the abyss …


Also me: TOMURA IS RAT!!!! 👏👏👏 A GREASY GOBLIN!!! JUST A FUNKY LITTLE CREATURE!!! 👏👏👏 GREMLINS RIGHTS 👏👏

title: Burden to Bear Ch 23!
body:
They’d already gone inside and started heading towards Sir’s office when Mirio got a thoughtful expression. “Hey, so you can like, tell me to buzz off,” The blond started, laughing a little at his own statement. “But I really was curious, what was it like, being raised by All Might?”

Read the update! OR Read from the beginning!

Blog created April 2, 2019. No fics before this date will be archived.

title: Data Analysis
description:
by Yurusarenai (iwantcandy2)

Out monster-slaying, Katsuki gets a face full of monster spores and needs medical attention. His slug familiar Deku is more than happy to help! Really, he’s helping. Just. So much helping. Whether Katsuki wants him to or not.

Based on Leafcat’s Slugku AU (@Riifuneko on Twitter).

blog.description: Hello, my name's Alex, I'm aromantic and my pronouns are they/them or he/him, welcome to my bnha sideblog! Don't be afraid to send asks or message me, I don't bite

summary: Hot take: Dabi is actually on the Non-Binary spectrum and Dabi is his chosen name while Touya is his deadname. Saying that he...
body: Hot take: Dabi is actually on the Non-Binary spectrum and Dabi is his chosen name while Touya is his deadname. Saying that he goes by Dabi is just his way of saying Dabi isn’t his birthname and that he chose the name and is trans, out and proud. After he got a little closer to the other members of the league, someone asked him about his deadname and he explained that he’s trans. That’s the reason no one in the league has asked what his deadname is after Shigaraki did when Dabi was introduced.

reblog.comment: Hot take: Dabi is actually on the Non-Binary spectrum and Dabi is his chosen name while Touya is his deadname. After he got a little closer to the other members of the league, someone asked him about his deadname and he explained that he’s trans. That’s the reason no one in the league has asked what his deadname is after Shigaraki did when Dabi was introduced.

That’s the reason no one in the league has asked what his deadname is after Shigaraki did when Dabi was introduced.

blog.name: ao3feed-kiribaku
blog.title: Shitty Hair x Blasty Fanfics
blog.description:
☆Kirishima Eijirou/Bakugou Katsuki fanfics☆
☆Please check the FAQ before asking anything thank you☆
☆Created 3/18/2019, no fics from before this date can appear here☆

title: Devil’s Fruit
description:
by ComiclzWrites

Angels are only suppose to work, do their job, their purpose, they aren’t suppose to love, aren’t suppose to want. That doesn’t stop Kirishima from wanting, from loving, from desiring his partner until the wings in his back start to come loose. He knows he’s falling, and he refuses to put that fate on Bakugo as well, so he leaves.

Bakugo, isn’t to happy about that.

blog.name: owlespresso
blog.title: hoot fucking hoot
blog.description: I'm a writing student. I like one-shots, drabbles and obscure AUs. I write headcanons in exchange for ko-fi donations!

title: Headcanons / Dabi
body:
My tip jar is open! I write headcanons in exchange for donations! If you’re interested, check it out HERE.
I am also open for commissions, information HERE.

He has a hard time being affectionate through words, because he’s accustomed to being an asshole with a dry sense of humor. The words “I love you” take a long time to come out of his mouth and for awhile, the best you get is “I like you” or a lukewarm “I tolerate you”. 

Instead of proclamating his adoration to the heavens above like some idiotic lovestruck heathen from a Shakespeare play, he opts to show his affection through touches andd gestures. Rarely ever does he not have an arm wrapped around your shoulders or waist. Rarely ever is he not looking out for you and making sure no one harasses you or harms you in any way.

He’s not a worrier. He doesn’t try to plan for the future because he’s very aware that he could die tomorrow, or in an hour from now. So, he asks you to not get on his ass about planning for the rest of his life. He’ll keep rolling with the League and being a villain until he finds something more worthwhile to do. And if you can accept his incredibly dangerous and morally filthy lifestyle, then he’ll appreciate you more than he appreciates the air he breathes.

His living quarters are admittedly sparse. He doesn’t own very much, but there are piles of laundry thrown about, maybe a few beer cans or takeout containers. He doesn’t feel the need to clean because he doesn’t spend much time there, but if you move in with him, then he’ll at least be considerate to tidy up a little.

Most of his work is done at night or close to nighttime, so he’ll try and get you to stay in bed with him as much as possible, even if you have early classes or a seven AM shift at work. He’ll wrap an arm around your waist, say “just five more minutes” and eventually propose that you just quit all together because he’s much too comfortable for you to leave.

Will offer to threaten your boss to move your shifts to later in the day, but he’ll refrain if you tell him not to. Also asks you as nicely as possible to schedule your classes later in the day. He won’t stop you or threaten you to do it, but he’ll pout if you don’t listen.

Surprisingly cuddly. Dabi isn’t used to people actually wanting to touch him and be close to him. Do people think he’s hot? Yeah, he can say that with confidence. Does he have one night stands? Sure. But no one ever really stays and he’s not used to falling asleep with anyone in his arms. He’s kind of addicted to having you in bed with him. Not just for having sex, but for using you as a pillow. Cuddling makes him feel secure in a way he’s never experienced before. It makes him feel loved and cared for.

Texts you in the middle of the day, or whenever you’re not with him. Usually just casual conversation starts or things like “please pick up food on your way home” or just telling you his whereabouts, since his schedule is unpredictable. He makes sure you know where he is whenever possible and he does like to keep tabs on your location. Not in a stalker-y way, but because he knows he has many enemies and he wants to be able to get to you should one of them target you.

He’s not a worrier. He doesn’t try to plan for the future because he’s very aware that he could die tomorrow, or in an hour from now. So, he asks you to not get on his ass about planning for the rest of his life. He’ll keep rolling with the League and being a villain until he finds something more worthwhile to do. And if you can accept his incredibly dangerous and morally filthy lifestyle, then he’ll appreciate you more than he appreciates the air he breathes.

His living quarters are admittedly sparse. He doesn’t own very much, but there are piles of laundry thrown about, maybe a few beer cans or takeout containers. He doesn’t feel the need to clean because he doesn’t spend much time there, but if you move in with him, then he’ll at least be considerate to tidy up a little.

Most of his work is done at night or close to nighttime, so he’ll try and get you to stay in bed with him as much as possible, even if you have early classes or a seven AM shift at work. He’ll wrap an arm around your waist, say “just five more minutes” and eventually propose that you just quit all together because he’s much too comfortable for you to leave.

Will offer to threaten your boss to move your shifts to later in the day, but he’ll refrain if you tell him not to. Also asks you as nicely as possible to schedule your classes later in the day. He won’t stop you or threaten you to do it, but he’ll pout if you don’t listen.

Surprisingly cuddly. Dabi isn’t used to people actually wanting to touch him and be close to him. Do people think he’s hot? Yeah, he can say that with confidence. Does he have one night stands? Sure. But no one ever really stays and he’s not used to falling asleep with anyone in his arms. He’s kind of addicted to having you in bed with him. Not just for having sex, but for using you as a pillow. Cuddling makes him feel secure in a way he’s never experienced before. It makes him feel loved and cared for.

Texts you in the middle of the day, or whenever you’re not with him. Usually just casual conversation starts or things like “please pick up food on your way home” or just telling you his whereabouts, since his schedule is unpredictable. He makes sure you know where he is whenever possible and he does like to keep tabs on your location. Not in a stalker-y way, but because he knows he has many enemies and he wants to be able to get to you should one of them target you.
trail.content_abstract:
My tip jar is open! I write headcanons in exchange for donations! If you’re interested, check it out HERE.
I am also open for commissions, information HERE.

He has a hard time being affectionate through words, because he’s accustomed to being an asshole with a dry sense of humor. The words “I love you” take a long time to come out of his mouth and for awhile, the best you get is “I like you” or a lukewarm “I tolerate you”.
